text: Tila sangitale gele ki mahalata pravesa kara. Jevha tine pahile tevha tila ase vatale ki ha jalasaya (hauda) ahe, tine apalya potarya ughadya kelya (sulemana) mhanale, ha tara kaceca banalela ahe. Ti mhanali, he majhya palanakartya! Mi apalya pranavara atyacara kela. Ata mi sulemanasobata, sarva visvancya palanakartya allahaci ajnadharaka banate
